data.text:
@trampbummer Hi. As a doctor should know, viruses can also enter the body through the eyes so I was wondering when you are going to make a mask with a full eye covering. 
After 2 years sitting on the sofa watching the goggle box I am finally thinking about venturing to take the bins out.
@marnaz54 We have tasked our in-house barristers with conducting a high level feasibility study. Ju x
@trampbummer Do your masks have a bit to store your lovely bamboo pens. Would be so handy.
